item.title: ECSC - Ceci n'est pas une pipe
item.description: The challenge description: Ã‡a se passe par ici : http://challenges.ecsc-teamfrance.fr:8001 Reconnaissance Ceci n'est pas une pipe is the very first challenge I tried during ECSC 2019 qualifications. It’s a web challenge and it starts with a login page: First steps From this very first page, some information already: It’s probably a PHP challenge because of the url: login.php The HTML source does not reveal anything interesting According to the HTTP response headers, the web server is Apache 2.
